attributes.action: Make transplant patients excempt from prescription charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: patients who have had transplants require  medication for the rest of their lives in order for them to not to reject the transplanted organ,as they have been given the opportunity of a second chance of life help them keep it!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
